membership_levels.name: Bronze Membership Level
benefits: Basic business listing on the chamber website

membership_levels.name: Silver Membership Level
benefits: Priority listing in the chamber directory
Spotlight advertising on selected website pages
Free entry to select networking events
Opportunity to host or sponsor events

membership_levels.name: Gold Membership Level
benefits: Exclusive invitations to special and executive events
Premium spotlight position on home page and newsletters
Larger discounts on event participation and sponsorship
Dedicated account manager for personalized support
